response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just a possession; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship that I believe could significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its unparalleled quality and rarity, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $900,000. I am confident that this price reflects its true worth while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Should you find this proposal appealing, I would be more than happy to discuss the details further and explore ways to finalize the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 900000}
